data.title: Yummy breakfast burrito and muffins!
data.text: Whenever I have some time to kill i love coming to this place. It has a little fireplace you can sit in front of during the winter months. Sadly it is in a gas station. But that isn't a big deal. The farmers choice breakfast burrito is amazing. I get it every time I am there. And the muffins are amazing. Nice and crispy on top. And under the top shell soft and moist.

data.title: GREAT coffee and good food
data.text: Fun place off the beaten bath for a coffee and a snack.  Their sandwiches and scones are very good.  Drawback is...it is in a gas station so in cold weather, the doors are opening and closing frequently, so choose seating accordingly.
